name: Reflection (itch) (evoleo)
description:
Really short metroidvania, my submission to 1-bit weekend game jam.

2 Upgrades, 1 enemy type and a boss with 2 phases

Put a lot of effort into this one, hope it will place something (kinda need those 100$)

Created with GameMaker Studio 2, the only pre-made assets are from Kenney's 1bit pack (mostly just tiles)

Theme:

Reflections. You deflect bullets with your shield and you fight your reflection at the end

Optional challenges:

  • Chiptune OST \/
  • Palette swap (nope)
  • Source code (soon)

Credits:

Game (sound/art/code) by Me (Evoleo)

Tileset, pixel font by Kenney

P.s. sorry in advance for any issues/unpolished things you can stumble upon, I was very ambitious and didn't put that much time into polishing. It's a jam game after all 8)

P.p.s. the game has a healthy amount of speedrunning potential (tho I had no time for implementing an actual timer), so I'd be REALLY happy if someone tried to beat it fast.

This demo is very short, so it's kinda not punishing for mistakes
